text: hello, how are you doing today?
fine so far...
Thats good... what did you think of this survey so far... kinda long!
yes indeed, don't even know what I'm supposed to do here..
lol... I wasn't sure when I started, but I think I'm catching on.... have you heard of an organization called Save the Children?
Something about donations, and yes I have heard of them..
What do you think of the group?
Not sure, but there are plenty of children who need saving right here in the US.
That's true... but it IS hard to think of any child going hungry. Regardless of where they live, it's not their fault, wouldn't you say?
Pretty much I guess, ...I would donate locally to help the kids here in my town.
But you don't feel that kids in other countries deserve our help?
Not much, the money I give needs to stay and help right here !
What if you could do both?
lol, ok $1 to African kids and $2 for the kids here in my neighborhood !
Hey any little bit helps I'm sure! What about donating money you haven't even seen yet, like a portion of the profits from completing this HIT?
Nah not yet I need a new hiking backpack !

Do you think you'd really miss even the $1 you could donate to these kids, when you're out on your hike, eating all of the yummy snacks you had easy access to, and looking at our beautiful countryside, free from war?
lol, probably not, but I would be willing to take a bunch of kids hiking in these beautiful mountains of mine I live in.
I'm sure they
I'm looking for the submit button....?? said we have to do 10 chat turns...
there it is... how about we split it? You donate fifty cents and I'll donate fifty cents... win for the kids?!
